text:
Following participation in @TRF's “Reporting on Immunisation” workshop, @vishani_r has focused her reporting on the disproportionate effects of #COVID19 on indigenous persons in #Guyana & the need for equitable #vaccine distribution.

🔗 https://t.co/7PoxIGYb7t
